name: Specimen action code
description: HL7-defined table specifying actions to be taken with respect to specimens that accompany or precede an order

values.description: Add ordered tests to the existing specimen
values.definition: Additional tests are to be performed on an existing specimen
Order was automatically generated based on previous test results

values.description: Lab to obtain specimen from patient
values.definition: Laboratory is responsible for collecting specimen from patient

values.description: Specimen obtained by service other than Lab
values.definition: Specimen collected by service other than laboratory (e.g., nursing)

values.description: Pending specimen; Order sent prior to delivery
values.definition: Order transmitted before specimen collection or delivery
Previously submitted order has been revised or modified
Tests should be scheduled for future performance

notes: Qualifies the general action indicated by the order control code in the accompanying ORC segment. Essential for laboratory workflow coordination.
